name: Will Knightley
summary: Will Knightley. Actor: Cracker. Will Knightley was born on 23 April 1946 in London, England, UK. He is an actor, known for Cracker (1993), BBC2 Playhouse (1973) and The Hound of the Baskervilles (1982). He has been married to Sharman Macdonald since 1976. They have two children.
